articles.author: Victoria Kennedy
articles.title: Sony overturns Helldivers 2 PSN requirement following backlash - Eurogamer.net
articles.description: Sony has backtracked on its plans to enforce mandatory PSN linking for Helldivers 2 players on Steam, following backlash.
articles.content:
Following backlash from its community, Sony has overturned plans to enforce mandatory PSN linking for Helldivers 2 players on Steam.
On Friday, the publisher announced Helldivers 2 players on Steam … [+2636 chars]
